\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 49979}

\subsection*{Silent Lucidity}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{Wi-Psy}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 &   & smoked & Damiana & dried\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 125.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
The smoke is very enjoyable.  It is tasty and fairly smooth.



At first I don't think anything is happening.  The more I try to feel something the less it works.  I've been smoking it the last few days (mostly bats, a few bowls, some bongs) and I'm noticing more and more that I just stop and smile more.  I'm not as rushed or hurried\ldots  I'm not as concerned with things that I can't control.  I don't notice a high, rather a difference in myself - a welcome relaxation.  Almost\ldots  tranquility.



The nicest thing about it is that it doesn't really impair me at all.  I feel very lucid.

\end{document}
